content: retro stripe sunburst granny square throw pattern *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/m1jw1iwvif4a1s1q9o0tdy9oaiwo7d this blanket how-to has been available for free on my website for sometime now but i had never put together proper pattern with gauge and yarn quantities in a pdf until now i hope you all find it useful this pattern is worked up using the large sunburst granny square the pattern uses red heart super saver in the colour retro stripes and aran with a 5mm hook the final blanket size was approximately 46 x59 inches pattern will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours/positioning - stitch glossary - printable pdf of blanket graph - full written instruction for the granny square used large sunburst granny square - written and video tutorial for border - video tutorials for the granny square as well as the continuous join as you go method happy crocheting everyone l m
